text:
.@Maddow: "You're not eligible to be tested at the meatpacking plant if you've potentially been exposed to coronavirus...

That [meatpacking] plant is open. Up and running. Eight employees dead already...[Trump] says these plants, though, 'it's all going fine.'" https://t.co/6qCqcufWz9
